about_the_game:
You wake up on the operating table in an abandoned insane asylum unaware of how you got there. Wander around the dark halls of horror as you solve puzzles and uncover the truth behind the dark history of Santa Rosa Asylum. Escape with your sanity intact or suffer to repeat the endless cycle. Now if you're reading this, you need to wake up!

Trigger Warner. This game may contain graphic descriptions and/or graphic implications of suicide. Player discretion advised.

Controls WASD, mouse to turn camera
Click to pick up items, click again to drop
"E" key if prompted to interact with items/ "E" again to stop interacting
"P" key to pause game or access settings page

-----------

Solo Developer Here! Thanks for checking out my game. I hope you all enjoy it and feel free to join the discord to report any bugs you find and I'll do my best to patch them as soon as possible.

name: Serene Asylum

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590/AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Serene Asylum is a first-person psychological horror puzzle game. Solve puzzles as you uncover the dark history of the insane asylum and try to escape before you are stuck in game forever. But don't be scared, it's just a game after all, right? Now... if you can read this, you need to wake up!
